1.Text:
On a day while the world is engulfed in the joy of
the New Year, the Seven Shadows each enjoy their
New Year's break. However...
Why...? What's going on...?!

(Lately, no matter how I arrange them, they just
don't feel right...)

(Am I lacking volume? No, the quantity and shape
should be perfect... Yet, why don't they feel as
impactful?)

Ah, it's so cold. Nothing beats a heated table
during New Year's—

Huh, it's just you here, Epsilon? Where are the
others?

...Master Shadow is busy with family matters.
Lady Alpha went somewhere with Delta, and
the others have their own engagements...

Hmm... Busy times for everyone during the New Year,
huh?

Well, I get the heated table all to myself then. Ahh,
this gentle warmth... This is what happiness is all
about...
...*sigh*

What's with the heavy sigh, Epsilon? You're ruining
my New Year vibes.
I-It's nothing.
You sure? Well, if you say so.

Anyway, why not have some red bean soup? It's good
for lifting your spirit when you're feeling down.
And make some for me too while you're at it.
Seriously? You just want some for yourself.

But...alright. I was getting hungry anyway.
I'll make some.

(...Rice cakes are so strange. They puff up so
much when you grill them...)

(I remember when eating the kagami rice cake,
I thought about using it as a substitute for
slime...)

(It didn't work out, though. Regular rice cakes are
far from ideal. They need to be softer, more elastic,
with a certain texture...)
It should have that bouncy feel to it, right?
Exactly, bouncy and jiggly—

...Wait, Zeta?! Weren't you curled up under the
heated table...?

Thought it was about time it'd be ready. Just in
case, let mine cool off a bit, please.
...Were you reading my mind just now?
No way, I can't do that. I'm not Master Shadow.

R-Right, of course. We were talking about rice cakes,
yes! Look! They're almost ready!

Whoa, looks deliciously grilled. If ordinary rice
cakes are this good, the legendary rice cake
must be amazing.
Legendary rice cake...?

You don't know? It's this rice cake called "Heart's
Bounty".

Never heard of it... What's so legendary about it?
Is it super tasty or something?
Well, it probably tastes delicious, no?

Perfect in softness, stretch, bounce, and
elasticity... If it's all that, it must be good,
I guess.
Softness...bounce, and elasticity...?!
Th-That's it!
Huh?

(I might be able to use that rice cake as a reference
for my slime body... In fact, I'm sure of it!)

Zeta! Tell me more about this "Heart's Bounty"!
Where can I find it?!
...I didn't know you were such a foodie, Epsilon.
It's not for eating! Come on, tell me where it is!

What will you use it for if not to eat it...? Sorry,
but I don't know exactly where it is either.

Anything you recall would help! You're my only hope
right now, Zeta!

Alright, alright. I'm not keeping it a secret,
and you don't have to beg. I'll tell you.
Zeta...thank you!

It's not like I have any confirmed intel either.
I just have a hunch.
That's fine! Tell me about your hunch!

...The Great Ize Shrine. The therianthrope shrine
Lady Alpha and Delta went to before.

2.Text:
The Great Ize Shrine... So this is where the "Heart's
Bounty" might be.

...Why did you drag me along? And why am I dressed
up in a kimono?

Well, I needed a guide, didn't I? And isn't it nice
wearing a beautiful outfit for a visit to a shrine?

By the way, I put a lot of thought into the design
of my kimono as well! The white camellia symbolizes
"perfect beauty," "impeccable charm"...

Don't you think it's perfect for me as I'm about to
acquire the perfect charm?
What do rice cakes have to do with "charm"?
Th-That's a secret! Come on, let's start looking!
Alright, alright... What the heck is up with you...?

And so, the two search the shrine for clues about
the legendary rice cake, but...
It's not here... It's nowhere to be found!

The rice cake at the stalls were also just regular
ones. It's a legend, so maybe it's not that easy to
find.

First of all, are you sure this is even the location
of the legendary rice cake? There are shady-looking
attractions and mascots, but nothing about this
shrine feels traditional...

We're talking about something legendary, right?
I imagined somewhere more...dignified.

I was surprised too when I first came here. Never
thought there'd really be a shrine like Lady Alpha
and that dumb dog described.

When I heard their story, I thought that meathead
had finally lost it.

...Hm?! I thought I heard someone bad-mouthing
me...!
Huh? That voice—

*sigh* Alright then. I told you both about last
year's Great Ize-athlon, right?
Yes, I heard it was a crazy event...

Right, and this year, they've spiced it up even more
for a lively and fun experience.

They've also changed the grand prize from the kagami
rice cake to "Heart's Bounty" rice cake—
"Heart's Bounty"?!

I'll participate! Whether it's "2.0" or whatever,
I'll win it!

Uh, okay...good luck. By the way, there are other
great prizes as well. Here's a flyer.
Let's see...hmm, interesting...

It's not your thing, kitty cat. Besides, you're too
scared to participate—
No, I'm participating too.
What?! Why?! You were reluctant to even come here...

That was then, this is now. I feel like joining the
festivities. That's fine, right?

(Did Zeta also develop a desire for the "Heart's
Bounty" while we were searching for it?)

(But I won't lose! No matter who my opponent is,
I won't hand it over!)

So, what will the dumb doggie do? Running away is
also a tactic, you know?

No way am I running away! Fine, I'll participate
too!

No, you can't. If you both participate, who knows
what will happen to the venue.
Then that's a default win for me, isn't it?
No way!

...Oh? If it isn't Alpha and Delta! Glad to see you
participating again this year!

You're the priest from last year... Unfortunately,
this year, we're just spectators.

I see, I see! In that case, Alpha, could you and the
others please provide live commentary and analysis?
What do you think?

I'm sure it will be quite exciting if the top
performers from the previous event could
take on this role!

I don't mind. Hehe. If I'm going to commentate,
I'll have to remain impartial.

Live commentary? Analysis? Can I make the kitty cat
admit defeat?

Priest, as you can see, you'd best give up on the
idea. Getting this dumb doggie to do commentary
is impossible.
What?! Leave the commentary and analysis to me!

Oh, thank you! In that case, will the commentators
please come with me? Those who wish to participate,
please hurry to the registration!
Well, we're off then. You two, do your best.
Of course!
Well, I might as well put in some effort.

(Zeta, putting in effort? She really is aiming to
win. But...)
...Zeta. I won't lose to you.
Huh? I don't plan to compete against you, Epsilon.

Does that mean you don't even see me as
competition?! I'm the one who's going to
win and get the "Heart's Bounty"!
It's not like that...but okay.
It's better for me if you're motivated. Hehe...

3.Text:
Here we are, at the start of the New Year again!
This is the Great Ize-athlon...no, the Great
Ize-athlon 2.0!

First, let me introduce our commentators, the top
two performers from the last event! Alpha and Delta!
I'm Alpha, the last winner. Pleased to be here.
Ehehe! I'm the runner-up, Delta!

This year, the Great Ize-athlon 2.0 has been
significantly revamped and made even harder!
It's a multi-participant long-distance race
overcoming numerous challenges!

I'm both excited and anxious to see what challenges
lie ahead...

Remember, straying off course means immediate
disqualification! That said, obstacles and traps are
fair game according to our brutal rules!
It wouldn't be fun without them!

The grand prize this time is the "Heart's Bounty"
rice cake! There are also luxurious prizes for the
other top performers, so give it your all!

(I won't settle for anything but coming in first.
I'm only after the main prize...!)

(There seem to be many therianthropes participating,
but none with physical abilities like Delta's...)

(I should only be wary of Zeta. Seeing how relaxed
she was earlier, I wouldn't be surprised if she's up
to something.)
All participants, please head to the starting line!

(Here we go... I'll get the "Heart's Bounty," and
then Master Shadow will only have eyes for me!)

There are more participants than I expected.
They're no match for us, though.

Yes...and under no circumstances will I lose to you
either.

Oh, you're all fired up. Keep up that energy,
Epsilon.
What?! Y-You seem to be awfully confident...!
(Fine then... I'll win no matter what it takes!)

Oh? Epsilon seems quite motivated. Heheh.
Competition can be a good thing sometimes.
That pussy cat is as annoying as ever!

Is everyone ready? Alright then, take your
positions—
Ready, set, go!
Hyaaaaaahhh!!!
And it's...Epsilon who's off to a good start!

But isn't she going too fast? I'm sure there are
obstacles up ahead...

(I've had a good start, but so far, it's just a
regular marathon. Not what I expected...)

If you space out like that, I'll leave you in the
dust.
Ah! Hey, get back here!

(...No use overthinking things. I'll just have to
run for the finish line—)
...Wait, what's that noise...?
Guess it's not just a regular marathon after all.

Hurry up, Epsilon. You don't want to get caught in
that thing.
That thing...?
...Wh-What the—?! What the heck is that ball?!
N-Not good! It's rolling this way!
I-I'm gonna get hit! Stay away from me!

Looks like this is the first challenge. Be careful,
Epsilon.

I know! Stop worrying about others, and look out for
yourself, Zeta!

4.Text:
Would one of the challenges in the Great Ize-athlon
2.0 consist of just running undisturbed?
Absolutely not!

The first ordeal is "Falling Balls"! Can the
participants reach the finish line while dodging a
multitude of rolling giant balls?

Oh my... Those participants caught off guard are
dropping out one after another.
What a turbulent start to the race!

This is as far as I go. All of you...carry on with
courage in your hearts and don't be afraid to go
forth...!
Master?! No, let's reach the goal together!

Watch out! That giant ball is so close...!
Hurry, or we'll get caught—
Aaaaghhhh—?!
Master—!
...What are they even doing?

Participants are getting blown away one after the
other by the giant balls! How will they manage to
escape?!

Let's hear from our commentators, Alpha and Delta.
What do you think about this first challenge?

It's intriguing. I've heard that rolling a large
ball originally symbolized the act of warding off
evil... I wonder how it turned into this mayhem?
Delta, how would you tackle these "Falling Balls"?
Just smash 'em all!

Well said from the previous winner and runner-up!
Such sharp analysis!
Hehe! Leave the thinking to me!

(I'm pretty sure Delta's brute force doesn't involve
any thinking...but, anyway, let's focus on this
challenge.)
I just need to dodge these balls and speed forward!

That elf is quite something. And she's so
beautiful...!

(Hehe, of course! I precisely calculated this outfit
so that I look beautiful even while running!)

(What do you think about my natural sway? Hehe, even
without the "Heart's Bounty," I might just beat that
airhead—)
Wh-Whoa! Look at that!
...Huh?
Excuse me, you're in the way. Coming through.

H-How can she walk so leisurely and still avoid the
balls...?!

(Just as I thought, Zeta...she's reading the
trajectory of the balls and calmly dodging... No,
it's almost like the balls are dodging her!)
(Wait, but more importantly...)
Oops, that was close. Misread that trajectory a bit.

(That natural yet bold sway... I haven't paid much
attention before, but Zeta's quite a natural
herself.)

(She's not on Beta's level, but...definitely a
formidable rival!)
Eek...?! What's with that elf's menacing aura?!

G-Get out of the way! Or we'll be finished off by
that elf!

(My pride won't let natural talent surpass me.
Just you wait, Zeta... I'll take the top spot!)
Oh, not bad, Epsilon. That's more like it.
Wow, she must really want that grand prize...

Epsilon is kinda different today! Use that energy to
take out that pussy cat!

She's always been fiercely competitive. You can tell
something's lit a fire in her heart.

Heheh... This event is shaping up to be quite
enjoyable.

Zeta was in the lead, but Epsilon has just caught
up! How will this race turn out—?!

5.Text:
The race is already heating up in the Great
Ize-athlon 2.0! Those in the lead are approaching
the next trial!

This is the second challenge... What kind of ordeal
awaits, and how will it be tackled... There's a lot
to look forward to.
What's next? A fistfight or something?

Our commentators are also curious about the next
event... It's called "Card Shoot"!

"Card Shoot"... I wonder what that could mean?
You throw a card to flip over other cards?

Exactly! Here, you'll need to flip over five cards
to advance.
It suddenly got so lame.
Y-You don't mince words, do you...

It's tame for the Great Ize-athlon, but it requires
flipping technique and throwing form... It'll be
interesting to see how each participant performs
individually.

Right! Exactly! Alpha, you're great at hyping things
up!
U-Uh... Thank you...

(Just flip over five cards, huh... Is that really
all there is to it?)
I see... So it's a challenge where control is key.
Heheh. This event seems tailor-made for me!

...Zeta, aren't you joining in? You haven't moved
all this time...

Don't mind me. This is like fishing—it's all about
the right timing.

I don't quite get it, but that's just fine by me!
Take this! Hyahhh!
Whoa! Epsilon's card flies with incredible control!

She's flipping the cards one after another!
Whoa, what a pace!

That's Epsilon for you. She doesn't rely on
strength, but on perfect form and precision.
Impressive technique.
*yawn* I'm getting sleepy.

Um, Delta? Could you show a little more enthusiasm,
please?
I'll use this momentum...and flip the fifth one!
...Huh, what? "Start over"...?!

Epsilon flipped the wrong card! She must place all
her cards back and start from scratch!
This is so unfair...!

Having to flip five cards in a row, and the right
ones, too... Everyone seems to be struggling.

Tsk... I have to start over! Just when I managed to
flip one!
Damn it... Where are the right cards?!

Cries of frustration ring out from the participants!
What will happen in "Card Shoot"? Who will emerge
triumphant?!

Ugh...I can't advance like this. Take this card and
go first!
But, this is the one you risked everything to flip—
Just do what I tell you! ...Do it for me too.
Jeez, maaaaan!
What are they even doing...?

Ugh... You got to be kidding. But I remember where
I put back the card I just took. If I aim for that one—
Oh, I'll take that, thank you.
Ah?! Hey!

Zeta manages to swipe it from under Epsilon's nose!
Epsilon's target card has been taken!

Never let your guard down. Thanks for handing it
over.
W-Wait, is that why you weren't moving earlier...?

Observation is my forte. I'm not breaking any rules,
so don't take it personally.
Got my five cards, so I'll catch you later.
Ugh...! Oh no you don't!

(...No, I can't let my emotions get the better of
me. I'll calmly determine which card to flip...!)

Oh? Epsilon appears to be frozen. Was she that
traumatized by having her card taken by Zeta?
...Her aura seems different.
Yes, she's...incredibly focused.

(The effects of the "start over" cards shouldn't
last long, so there must be a subtle difference
in the amount of magic residue between them
and the correct cards...)

(I'll use my magic detection to discern the
difference...!)

...Got it! The right cards are...this, this, this,
this and...this!

Incredible! Epsilon flawlessly flipped all five of
the right cards!

It may seem like luck to the casual onlooker,
but it's not. It's her skill that pulled that off.
Card shooting looks fun! I wanna play too!

The entire venue erupts in response to Epsilon's
miraculous performance! No one can take their
eyes off of whatever's coming next!

Just you wait, Zeta... I'll catch up to you soon
enough!

6.Text: The race continues after "Card Shoot," but...

Hmph... What's Epsilon doing?! She's not catching up
to that kitty cat!
At this rate, I'll have to interfere—
Sit.
Ugh... Yes, ma'am...

The race is nearing its climax. I wonder what the
final challenge will be.

I'm glad you asked! The final ordeal is..."Rice Cake
Pounding"!

Participants must take down a giant rice cake-like
slime and its minions with a mallet while shouting
"flat"!
Whoa! Sounds fun and tasty!

Remember, you must shout "flat"! Fail to say it,
and you'll be disqualified!
Wh-What...?! Who're you calling "flat"?!

Um...who...? It's a traditional chant when pounding
rice cakes, you know?
...Ah! R-Right... Hahah...

(Right, it's about rice cakes... In no way is it
meant to mock someone's physique. Calm
down, Epsilon!)
...Okay. Here goes, "Flat..."

Epsilon has begun taking out the minions!
But her shout is small! So small!
...What? What're you calling "small"?!
I meant your chanting...
Hraaahhh! Flat! Flat!
Flat! Flat! Flat!!!
Nghh...

Epsilon has stopped moving again! Will we see
another miracle like we witnessed with "Card Shoot"?

Unfortunately, it doesn't seem so. She looks
frustrated, but why...?
Epsilon, move! If you don't, the kitty cat will win!

(This is the worst... The actual worst! So what if
I'm actually flat-chested, and these breasts are
fake! I've worked hard for them...)

(...But do I still fall short of that airhead...?
If I'm going to have to suffer like this, I might
as well—)
Hey, watch out!
Huh...?
Ughhh?!
You... Y-You protected me...?

...That giant slime is scary. It's only natural to
freeze up.
(Um, he protected me, but...who even is this?)

But thanks to my master and my senior, I get it now.
Regardless of what stands in our way, we must move
forward...!

So, even if it's reckless, I'll accept the
challenge! Again and again!

(Even if it's scary or reckless...accept the
challenge...)

(Yes... I kept moving forward, even when my heart
almost broke before obtaining this body...)

(I can't let that challenge I accepted...go to waste
here!)
Hyaaaahhh! Flaaaat!!!

Epsilon is back in full force! She's running with
incredible momentum!

She seems to be showing signs of growth. Heheh.
She's still evolving.

(...That guy inspired me, but what even was that
charade...?)
Flat! Flat! Flaaaat!

Epsilon has overtaken the other participants,
reaching the lead group! But the giant slime
lies in wait ahead!

It doesn't look too violent or dangerous, but that
rice cake-like body...seems a bit troublesome.
A light scratch won't be enough to take it down.

This thing...looks like a handful. Well then,
how should I attack it...?
Oh, Epsilon! I was waiting for you.
...Wait, you wanted to team up with me?
That's part of it.

Part of it? Well, whatever. Right now, let's join
forces to defeat this thing!
Sure, sounds good... Here it comes!

7.Text:
...Whew. That was easier than I expected.
Well, that's what happens when the two
of us team up.

Exactly. It was worth waiting...although that's not
the only reason.
What do you even mean by that—?

Never mind. For now, let's focus on reaching the
finish line. We wouldn't want someone else to snatch
our victory after we defeated the slime, would we?

R-Right... Well, Zeta, from here on out, it's a real
showdown!
Sure thing. Don't leave me behind...hup!

And Epsilon and Zeta are off running! We are about
to witness the winner of the Great Ize-athlon 2.0!
Good luck...both of you.
Epsilon! Take her out!

(Ack... Zeta's fast...! At this rate, my win...
my grand prize...!)
O-Ow! I got a foot cramp!
Huh?

Whoops, Zeta has had an accident! She's slowing down
right before the goal!

Wh-What the...? Fine, if she's going to let me win,
I'll take it—

Epsilon doesn't stop! And there she goes, crossing
the finish line! The winner is Epsilon!
Ouch, owwww.

And Zeta also crosses the finish line! She comes in
second place!

A surprising turn of events. It looked like she fell
on purpose...
Yay, yay! The kitty cat lost! That's what she gets!

Now that we've determined the placements, let's move
to the award ceremony! The prizes will be presented
by our commentators! Don't miss it!

And the victor of this year's Great Ize-athlon 2.0
is...Epsilon!
Hey, why did you hold back?
Hmm?

Don't play dumb. You didn't really cramp your foot
before the finish, did you? You did that on purpose
to let me win?

Well, yeah... People have their own goals, you know.
Mine wasn't to be first, that's all.

Congratulations to both of you. You were impressive.
Here, these are your prizes.

Epsilon wins and gets the rice cake, and you,
kitty cat...get Golden Sardines.

S-So, this is the "Heart's Bounty"...! It really
does radiate grace and beauty—
...Huh? Golden Sardines? Zeta, don't tell me you...

Yeah, this is what I wanted—the second-place prize.
They say it's a legendary fish that tastes great and
is good for your looks.

*sigh* So that's why you suddenly got fired up after
reading the flyer...

(I was so focused on the main prize, that I didn't
even notice... A rare fish as second prize...)

(It's supposed to be good for beauty... Makes me
wonder if I missed out.)

Heheh. I can't wait to sun-dry these at home.
They're going to be delicious...!

(...Well, it's fine. I got the "Heart's Bounty,"
after all!)

Aww... I wish I got to join in. I would've won first
place...

After watching the two of you, I do feel like moving
my body...

Next, we'll have an exhibition match of "Hagoita
Deathmatch"! Those wishing to participate, please
come to the central square!
Oh, Hagoita Deathmatch! Lady Alpha, let's compete!

Alright, I'll take you on. But don't expect any
mercy.
B-Bring it on!

Are you two joining? It's surprisingly strategic and
fun.
No, I'm...quite exhausted...

Me too. I want to cook these Golden Sardines as soon
as possible.
Oh, I see. Let's go then, Delta.
Well, guess it's time for us to head back.

Heheh. Can't wait to study this "Heart's Bounty"!
My ultimate body is within reach...!
...Seriously, what are you planning to do with that?

A few days after their fierce battle at Great Ize
Shrine...
Master Shadow, how's the dried Golden Sardine?
It's delicious. The amount of fat is just perfect.

Hehe. Glad to hear that. It was worth the effort of
going to the shrine.

Hmph... It's unfair that only the kitty cat gets
praised!

If you're that envious, why don't you catch some
yourself? Oh, but a dumb dog like you couldn't do
that.
I can fish! I'll go right now!

That's enough. The New Year has just started, and
look at you two already...
Ha-ruff... It's because of this kitty cat...
The one who started the fight was you, dumb dog.
Let's at least spend today peacefully...understood?
Eep...! O-Of course!
...Alright.

(Man, that pressure she's putting on them... Alpha's
the least peaceful one here...)

Master Shadow! Notice anything different about me
today...?

(How's this?! By studying the "Heart's Bounty,"
I've reached new heights with my slime bodysuit...!)
Whoa...
(Heheh. He's captivated...!)

(Epsilon's further improved her...skills. She's
subtly adjusted her magic, making them even
more realistic.)

(That meticulous approach of hers has leveled up
even more. I should properly acknowledge her
efforts.)

You're even more bountiful than usual.
Keep refining your figure.

(Ah... Ah... Master Shadow praised me!
This perfect body of mine...!)
Ngh... Master... I-I...will keep trying my best!

Y-Yeah... I see how your own effort has moved you to
tears.

Having achieved their respective goals, Epsilon and
Zeta go on to enjoy a peaceful New Year's...
